law.catch_line: Dividends And Voting Rights After Demand For Payment

text.section: A bill shall not be filed within the time provided in section ninety;
A bill, if filed, shall be dismissed as to such stockholder; or

Such stockholder shall with the written approval of the corporation, or in the case of a consolidation or merger, the resulting or surviving corporation, deliver to it a written withdrawal of his objections to and an acceptance of such corporate action.
